languages.text: {n}Глейто вытягивается в сторону ящиков, и Соломон кивком указывает вам на них.{/n} "Любопытное тут лежит барахло. Потрясите старика, так ли он безобиден, каким хочет казаться".

{n}Glaito's whole body leans in the direction of the crates sitting next to the man, and Solomorne directs your attention toward them with a nod.{/n} "Some curious things he has stored in there. I suggest you give the old man a good shake and see if he is as harmless as he wants to appear."
languages.original_text: {n}Глейто вытягивается в сторону ящиков, и Соломон кивком указывает вам на них.{/n} "Любопытное тут лежит барахло. Потрясите старика, так ли он безобиден, каким хочет казаться".

I suggest you give the old man a good shake and see if he is as harmless as he wants to appear."

{n}Glaito's whole body leans in the direction of the crates sitting next to the man, and Solomorne directs your attention toward them with a nod.{/n} "Some curious things he has stored in there. I suggest you give the old man a good shake and see if he is as harmless as he wants to appear."

languages.text: {n}格雷托整具身躯都向那个人身旁板条箱的方向靠了过去。索罗蒙点了点头，引起了你的注意。{/n}“他在那边存放了些有趣的东西。那个老家伙装出一副人畜无害的样子，我建议你仔细审审他，看看他实际上是不是这么回事。”
languages.original_text: {n}Glaito's whole body leans in the direction of the crates sitting next to the man, and Solomorne directs your attention toward them with a nod.{/n} "Some curious things he has stored in there. I suggest you give the old man a good shake and see if he is as harmless as he wants to appear."

traits.locale_text: {n}格雷托整具身躯都向那个人身旁板条箱的方向靠了过去。索罗蒙点了点头，引起了你的注意。{/n}“他在那边存放了些有趣的东西。那个老家伙装出一副人畜无害的样子，我建议你仔细审审他，看看他实际上是不是这么回事。”

languages.text: {n}El cuerpo de Glaito al completo se inclina hacia las cajas que hay junto al hombre, y Solomorne te las indica con un movimiento de cabeza.{/n} «Tiene cosas muy curiosas ahí guardadas. Sugiero que registre bien al anciano para comprobar si es tan inofensivo como pretende aparentar».
languages.original_text: {n}Glaito's whole body leans in the direction of the crates sitting next to the man, and Solomorne directs your attention toward them with a nod.{/n} "Some curious things he has stored in there. I suggest you give the old man a good shake and see if he is as harmless as he wants to appear."

traits.locale_text: {n}El cuerpo de Glaito al completo se inclina hacia las cajas que hay junto al hombre, y Solomorne te las indica con un movimiento de cabeza.{/n} «Tiene cosas muy curiosas ahí guardadas. Sugiero que registre bien al anciano para comprobar si es tan inofensivo como pretende aparentar».

languages.text: {n}L'attention de Glaito est dirigée sur les caisses près de l'homme. Solomorne vous les désigne du menton.{/n} « Il stocke de curieuses choses dans ces caisses. Je vous suggère de le malmener un peu pour voir s'il est aussi innocent qu'il veut nous le faire croire. »
languages.original_text: {n}Glaito's whole body leans in the direction of the crates sitting next to the man, and Solomorne directs your attention toward them with a nod.{/n} "Some curious things he has stored in there. I suggest you give the old man a good shake and see if he is as harmless as he wants to appear."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'attention de Glaito est dirigée sur les caisses près de l'homme. Solomorne vous les désigne du menton.{/n} « Il stocke de curieuses choses dans ces caisses. Je vous suggère de le malmener un peu pour voir s'il est aussi innocent qu'il veut nous le faire croire. »

languages.text: {n}グライトは、男の隣に置かれた木箱の方へと身を乗り出した。ソロモーンは顎をしゃくって、あなたの注意をそちらへ向けさせた。{/n}「この老人は、興味深い物をいくつか隠してるようです。無害なふりをしていますが、本当にそうか、しっかり揺さぶって確かめてみることをお勧めします」
languages.original_text: {n}Glaito's whole body leans in the direction of the crates sitting next to the man, and Solomorne directs your attention toward them with a nod.{/n} "Some curious things he has stored in there. I suggest you give the old man a good shake and see if he is as harmless as he wants to appear."

traits.locale_text: {n}グライトは、男の隣に置かれた木箱の方へと身を乗り出した。ソロモーンは顎をしゃくって、あなたの注意をそちらへ向けさせた。{/n}「この老人は、興味深い物をいくつか隠してるようです。無害なふりをしていますが、本当にそうか、しっかり揺さぶって確かめてみることをお勧めします」

languages.text: {n}Glaito'nun tüm vücudu, adamın yanındaki kasalara doğru eğiliyor. Solomorne, başıyla dikkatini oraya çekmeye çalışıyor.{/n} "Orada bazı ilginç şeyler saklamış. İhtiyar adamı güzelce bir sarsmanı ve göründüğü kadar zararsız olup olmadığını anlamanı öneririm."
languages.original_text: {n}Glaito's whole body leans in the direction of the crates sitting next to the man, and Solomorne directs your attention toward them with a nod.{/n} "Some curious things he has stored in there. I suggest you give the old man a good shake and see if he is as harmless as he wants to appear."

traits.locale_text: {n}Glaito'nun tüm vücudu, adamın yanındaki kasalara doğru eğiliyor ve Solomorne başıyla dikkatini oraya çekmeye çalışıyor.{/n} "Orada bazı ilginç şeyler saklamış. İhtiyar adamı güzelce bir sarsıp, göründüğü kadar zararsız olup olmadığını anlamanı öneririm."

languages.text: {n}Glaitos gesamter Körper lehnt sich in die Richtung der Kisten neben dem Mann, und Solomorne lenkt mit einem Nicken deine Aufmerksamkeit auf sie.{/n} "Er lagert darin merkwürdige Dinge. Ich schlage vor, Ihr schüttelt den alten Mann gut durch und findet heraus, ob er wirklich so harmlos ist, wie er vorgeben möchte."
languages.original_text: {n}Glaito's whole body leans in the direction of the crates sitting next to the man, and Solomorne directs your attention toward them with a nod.{/n} "Some curious things he has stored in there. I suggest you give the old man a good shake and see if he is as harmless as he wants to appear."

Ich schlage vor, Ihr schüttelt den alten Mann gut durch und findet heraus, ob er wirklich so harmlos ist, wie er vorgeben möchte."
